website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price per ounce of cleaning solution. Includes a microfiber cloth.
pros: Adds a protective layer to the stainless steel to help it resist smudges in the future
Works well on any stainless steel surface indoors or outdoors
Uses a neutral pH formula that's safe to use around pets or small children
cons: May not clean all fingerprints effectively
Doesn't work well on rust spots

customer_reviews.title: Works well, be careful not to overspray.
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner works really well but make sure that you spray onto the rag and then wipe otherwise it can leave build up on other surfaces and wood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: C Warren

customer_reviews.title: This works perfectly for my stainless steel appliances it does ...
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for my stainless steel appliances it does not leave any streaks and leaves a smooth finish. Just a note, you might see some streaks as you were wiping but once everything dries it does not show
customer_reviews.author: iShuush

customer_reviews.title: Works brilliantly! Almost no elbow grease required and made my appliances look like new.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd review something as mundane as appliance cleaner, but here I am. I can't believe how well this stuff works. it took care of water spots on my fridge and dishwasher instantly, along with every fingerprint, smudge, old sticker goop - you name it. My appliances are only about a year old but anyone with stainless stuff knows that the fingerprints can add up quickly and it's a constant battle with a bottle of Windex. This stuff is incredible, and requires almost no elbow grease at all. If you have stainless steel stuff, buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Seventh-777Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: So bought this stainless steel cleaner and it's amazing, it is everything it is promises to be
customer_reviews.text: Recently did my kitchen over with all stainless steel appliances. Have been washing them down with a wet rag but notice bunch of streaks and marks. So bought this stainless steel cleaner and it's amazing, it is everything it promises to be. Effectively and efficiently cleans the stainless steel appliances so they shine.
customer_reviews.author: Luckydwg

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, but small concerns...
customer_reviews.text: Have to say that compared to my Method steel cleaner, this one works great! It makes things super easy to clean and buffing cloth is very good at collecting residue and producing shine. If I didn't have two little ones running around, sticking magnets, and playing on my steel appliances that I would keep this hands downs. However, I do have two little ones and a less hazardous version would help. Not so much the skin or touching, but the possible ingestion after touching is a sure concern for the wife. So, we will use this one carefully. If this isn't a concern for you, then get this as it will help making cleaning things easier for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A. Cotto

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works great on fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 kids and recently purchased my first stainless steel refrigerator. I ordered this cleaner and it is AMAZING! It smells great, the cloth is double-sided (one for cleaning, one for polishing). The fingerprints came right off with very little effort on my part!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Noland

customer_reviews.title: Believe the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I trust other buyers on Amazon when they give reviews. When I saw Weiman's Stainless Steel cleaner and polisher with 5 stars I took a chance. I had purchased other products and they were all OK but each had its issues. My grill is stainless but its big and is displayed prominently so everyone sees it. Weiman's product was the best and my grille has never looked so good. I would give more than 5 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your stainless steel looking good
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my stainless steel looking great. My stove is over 2 years old and oh boy once I’m done cleaning it and rub this baby on it looks like new again. And I cook at least 4 times a week and that’s just dinner. And I make breakfast at home at least 3-4 days on the stove as well . I also clean my fridge with it.
customer_reviews.author: R.Mentor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect streak free shine. Just take the cloth and apply the cleaner/polish and then wipe off. It only takes one minute and your appliance will be clean, shinny and streak free. No rubbing or scrubbing. I have tried several stainless steel cleaners and nothing works as good or as fast as this one. EXCELLENT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Rumpylv

customer_reviews.title: Expensive baby oil
customer_reviews.text: "No streaks" is a bit misleading. You have to clean the entire surface or yes, you definitely see streaks as it darkens the shade of the steel. So not for spot cleaning. Also, this product is just mineral oil (baby oil). Cheaper to buy that and rub it on.
customer_reviews.author: Torty

customer_reviews.title: At long last...the perfect polisher!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been look for so many years for the perfect stainless steel polish, it was such a long journey in buying all sorts of cleaners. I took a chance on this one. Boy! Did I get the biggest success!!! So happy have suggested to all my friends this product. I recommend highly the spray, rather than the wipes. They are too small and don't have the same effect for some reason. Does not smear or feel greasy. Smells good too. This is THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dion Pageau

customer_reviews.title: This cleaner with towel works great! I don't mind cleaning with this product because ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally got new appliances & went with stainless steal. Finger prints & smudges show more than I thought they would for some reason. This cleaner with towel works great! I don't mind cleaning with this product because it works. I am very happy with this & would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job for what I expected it to do. I recently purchased a refrigerator with a stainless steel door and couldn't get it looking good with just a soft cloth or dishrag so I took a chance on this product, which is specifically for that use. It works perfectly and even included the soft cloth to use. Nice size bottle so I expect it will last a long time. I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: I love using this product
customer_reviews.text: I love using this product, it works very nice on the stove and frig. No streaking just SHINE. I will recommend Weiman stainless cleaner to anyone who has stainless appliances..I tried others not mentioning any names ,but this one does the job right...Spray wipe and buff..Thank you for making a great product..Now do you have anything for scratches.?
customer_reviews.author: AJ Chesney

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that not all stainless steel cleaners were safe to use (!) I couldn't find the one the salesman recommended so I decided to try Weiman Stainless Steel Cleaner. I first tried it on the side of the refrigerator that no one sees, but it was great! Spray it on, wipe with the microcloth they supply and polish with a soft towel. The appliances look like new and its easy enough to maintain. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Th Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST stainless steel cleaner/polisher! Easy spray on, wipe off and dry buff. No need to continually wipe and wipe and wipe and wipe(my arm is tired just thinking about it).... it leaves No streaks like the other cleaners Ive waisted money on. Like-new shine. You won’t be disappointed I promise. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Satterwhite

customer_reviews.title: Spray and cloth are the perfect combination!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning all my stainless appliances and kitchen trash cans. At first I was using the stainless steel "wipes" that come already ready to use from a can; however, they have a tendency to dry up quickly, so they are a waste of money for me. With this spray and the cloth that comes with it, you can have it forever and I find this combination much nicer to use overall. You will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: SocalDancer

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle arrived damaged-the spray handle broken off. Very poor packaging. There was a quick replacement. I used it on my refrigerator with water streaks from the icemaker. They are no longer there. There were similar results on the microwave, stove, dishwasher and sink. I had tried several other methods of cleaning/shining the items in the kitchen. Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Fridge finally sparkling like new
customer_reviews.text: Now my fridge is sparkling clean! I got a bunch of rust like marks all over my fridge. I used baking soda initially to get some of the very hard spots then used the cleaner. What a difference! Fridge is finally shining and looking clean. I’ve used the cleaner a few times now and I’ve noticed less finger prints and other marks on the fridge. I didn’t think it would do such a good job keeping finger prints off. I have three small kids and usually my fridge looks well used. Super happy with the cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Alark

customer_reviews.title: Inferior
customer_reviews.text: There are many more , far superior Stainless Steel cleaners , for the consumer to choose from ,that are less expensive and give you better results . Just shop around .
customer_reviews.author: Fran Manoulian

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner for my Whirlpool refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This Weiman stainless steel cleaner and polish does an excellent job at cleaning my Whirlpool stainless steel refrigerator. My microwave, dishwasher and gas range are Whirlpool fingerprint resistant stainless steel and I am very pleased with the way they look and the fact that I do not have to worry about stains on them. However, it has been difficult to keep my Whirlpool stainless steel (not fingerprint resistant) refrigerator clean. This Weiman stainless steel cleaner and polish removed tough stains on my Whirlpool refrigerator without any streaks. I highly recommend buying this spray and the microfiber cloth it comes with as they are great products.
customer_reviews.author: RALUCA

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner for stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner/polisher I have found for stainless steel, and so easy to use! This morning I baked some lemon bars for company coming. While waiting for them to bake I decided to polish my stainless steel appliances, using Weiman's and the recommended cloth. At the end of the 20 min. baking time, my refrigerator, dishwasher and oven were sparkling--no smears or fingerprints! Just had to say thank you Weimans!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply and use.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and delighted with the results of using this product. Sprayed on no shaking necessary and cleaned and polished my refrigerator, microwave and dish washer they look brand new👍
customer_reviews.author: Paticia Lenehan

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprints be-gone!!!
customer_reviews.text: If only I had known about this product a few years ago, would have saved me a lot of grief! Fingerprints begone! Is what they should call it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Thiergart

customer_reviews.title: Best product for stainless steel appliances I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have used several other products on my stainless steel appliances that always left streaks on the appliances and left me frustrated after working so hard on cleaning them. This product is wonderful. Minimal effort to clean the product and no streaks. I have already ordered another bottle to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely w/ the included microfiber cloth
customer_reviews.text: I think some of the people who are having a problem w/ this product are not reading the directions. The key is to wipe off the spray w/ the micro fiber. All of these polymer like products work best with a micro fiber cloth. Prevents streaks and gives a nice shine.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: No film
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t leave a film and easy to use.I apologize I lost the question from some was it water based. All I can tell you it is liquid. Says it contains white mineral oil. It is phosphate free. I hope this message gets to you
customer_reviews.author: PJS1957

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Clean Up
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and thought this might be helpful with the prints and water streaks my toddlers leave. I didn't actually think it would work as well as it does. WOW! My appliances look new after using this. WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and the cleaning towel it comes with. I use it on my microwave too that’s above the stove. A lot of grease collects there but this product cleans it so well it leaves it looking like new.
customer_reviews.author: A Mikaelian

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy with some of our stainless appliances due to a streaky and unsatisfactory appearance. I had no idea that a cleaner made for the express purpose of cleaning SS would make such a difference but it totally does. Works great, goes on and comes off easily and the new appearance of the SS lasts. The included micro cloth is a nice bonus! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works well on black appliances as well.
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well on my appliances. It takes a little muscle grease to buff it out but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Pennino

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells pretty good too!
customer_reviews.text: My mom told me “just buy Weiman to clean your stainless appliances. Don’t bother trying anything else.” Like with so many other things, my mom was right! They look great and it takes no time at all! Every 4th or 5th time I toss the towel in the laundry (with rags) and it comes out like new.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed on the micro cloth that was provided and the fingerprints disappeared. Much better than soap and water. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: for stainless steel builtin oven
customer_reviews.text: Weiman cleaning products are great. in addition to this one, the leather wipes are great on our couch and 2 recliners, all are leather.
customer_reviews.author: MariettaMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Weiman Stainless Steel Wipes to this bottle to get more for the money. Previously, I tried other brands and methods but they all fell short. You can't go wrong with this brand in either form.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Cee

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is great! I used it to clean up stainless steel appliances to sell the house and was amazed by the fantastic job it did. The cloth that comes with it works wonders. I'll be using it from now on in my new home.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sabato

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I have worked in many commercial kitchens and having the right cleaning products matters. I use this stainless steel cleaner at home and it works wonders. Not streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Alison H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Easily took out tough to remove fingerprints from my stainless fridges, yes I had two that needed cleaned up. You don't want to just spot clean, but rather wiped down the whole surface to get a uniform look. The newly polished surface does seem to be fingerprint resistant as advertised. Would buy again, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A necessity when moving to stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans SS as advertised. Has a strong "polishy" odor. Nice to have dedicated cloth to use. I have no basis for comparison to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I like all the Weiman stainless steel products. A good value for the money and product cleans better than any I have tried. I love the stainless steel wipes as well, especially for the bbq grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't see product being sprayed on to surface.
customer_reviews.text: I don't see anything coming out of the spray bottle. Am I missing something?
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Kirk

customer_reviews.title: I had hope
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed it didn’t work for me. My stainless steel refrigerator looks foggy with this spray. Smells great but didn’t work speaking for my personal experience only
customer_reviews.author: Deicy

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well, cleans and helps keep down finger print. Seems to be an oily based product. I did find it for about half the price at a large box store locally. I would recommend and buy the product again
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This IS the best - don't wait
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave reviews, however this IS a great product. Don't be gentle with the spray pump and when you unleash this you will be glad. In minutes my Fridge was shiny, finger prints gone and looked better than new. The dishwasher was transformed. It was fast, easy and worked. If you want beautiful appliances that look like new, THIS is the product!! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I used another product, which shall remain nameless, and I was totally disappointed with the results. I ordered WEIMAN STAINLESS STEEL CLEANER and I love the bright and clean look of my refrigerator. Will I buy it again?? You bet! MzAnna
customer_reviews.author: Anna J Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Good product, boyfriend tells me
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves it. I asked him if I could see demo and he can’t locate it :) I use a steamer to clean my refrigerator, but he loves this product.
customer_reviews.author: My opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner, Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, leaves a brilliant shine after following instructions. Takes time to get it perfect on oven (not the cleaners fault) just a lot of corners etc. A+ Product.
customer_reviews.author: James Marino

customer_reviews.title: Repels fingerprints!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several products to keep my stainless appliances clean. The fingerprints are so annoying! But ever since using this cleaner the fingerprints are like repelled & I barely have to touch up. No more stress!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I also really love the towel that came with it. I tried so many other options and considering my entire kitchen is stainless steel appliances this is saving me!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and well on appliances
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and it worked great. It left our stainless steel appliances shiny without much effort, and removed fingerprints. Have yet to see if the product helps keep the appliances cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use and you can see the difference from the first time all my kitchen shines thanks to this product that I apply once a week
customer_reviews.author: Alien

customer_reviews.title: Wow. This Stuff is Magic.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This stuff is magic. Easy to apply and outcome is a like new stove top. It has to be reapplied after moderate use, but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TireTracksUpNorth

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell
customer_reviews.text: This product does work really well, but I'm surprised no reviews warned about the smell. It has a very strong chemical smell that was overwhelming even after I put a mask on while using it. Seems like it can't be healthy to breathe near this stuff. I have my fan on in the kitchen now with the door open hoping it will air out. My stainless steel appliances look great, but I'm not sure it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal,you will have to it,I was skeptical,boy was I surprised it does a outstanding job.You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with the cloth that comes with it. All our appliances are stainless so it is very useful and effective.
customer_reviews.author: sharon reiss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleaner!! Definite buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Will definitely buy again and again!! Works awesome. Sometime I forget to wipe down before use and it still gets the job done!! Makes my appliances look brand new again!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Looks New!
customer_reviews.text: The young woman who comes to clean (She can still kneel down!) says this cleaner and cloth combo is easy to use and the stainless looks as if it just came from the store! I love buying products which deliver what they promise.
customer_reviews.author: waterviewgal

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have all stainless steel appliances and one really drooly dog. I highly recommend this product, not only did it get the drool off my appliances but it also polished my appliances and made them look like new. Also FYI a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy haddox

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing!!! I feel it's a bit watery, but isn't oily like the last one I purchased. Def buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Ryanielle

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many stainless steel cleaners and this one is the best so far! It cuts through grease on the stove top and returns it to a nice shiny clean. My dishwasher and refrigerator always brand new looking clean! Highly recommend l!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Crandell

customer_reviews.title: which I'm now happier with.
customer_reviews.text: This made cleaning a stainless steal stove a breeze. Something I thought I could never get cleaned to my satisfaction. I also used it on a sink in my work room, it didn't take off the old stains, but it did polish the rest of the sink , which I'm now happier with.
customer_reviews.author: Elinor

customer_reviews.title: I think this is slightly cheaper at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize they sold this at Home Depot until I saw it-- sure you get a microfiber with it but not a big deal. It works really well though, and would recommend it. We used it to clean our stainless steel fridge, that gets dirty pretty easily after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jax L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Wow .... this is an amazing cleaner. It cleans amazing great and does help with future marks on appliances. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I feel as though I’ve been searching for this product all my life. I have a kitchen full of stainless including a big sub-zero frig that has, until today, never looked as good as it did the day I bought it. This product is simple to use and produces excellent results with minimal elbow grease needed. Buy it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: VRR2536

customer_reviews.title: Reliable SS Cleaner and Polish.
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaner for stainless steel cooktop and stainless steel sink. Polished nicely. You pay a bit more, but it is worth it because it lasts a while, too.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have a stainless steel frige and this is perfect to keep it clean where other cleaners did not.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lin

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: We have several stainless steel appliances and sinks. Product works well on all of them without too much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Paladin

customer_reviews.title: BEST STAINLESS STEEL CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: i HAVE USED THIS PRODUCT FOR 6 MONTHS. I wouldn't trust my stainless steel appliances with anything else
customer_reviews.author: Christine  McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely a winner. I have a stainless steel refrigerator that had tough grease stains and many finger prints on it. I used this solution spray and it took it all off on my refrigerator. It is amazing! I would definitely recommend anyone to buy this product. For Sure!! However, I would definitely suggest to use microfiber cloths to clean it with. It leaves a nice shine!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Afanador

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for stainless steel appliances. It makes them so easy to clean and looking wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Sue Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I thought that my stainless steel appliances were clean. Well, I was mistaken. This product was easy to use, easy to shine (the product does this) and is still shiny. My appliances are 15 years old and never looked so good. It even shines my new dishwasher that is supposedly stainless steel, but does hold a magnet. My other stainless steel appliances do not hold magnets at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Musser

customer_reviews.title: Easy to used
customer_reviews.text: I like the product it does exactly what it say.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I was using windex a couple times every day before to keep stainless steel refrigerator clean :( — but this cleaner works great and keeps fridge clean and polished for a couple of days!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily DiCroce

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!!! I use it on my appliances as well as on all my granite countertops. Really does a great job, lots of shine. Be sure to spray, wipe, and buff/wipe one final time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: EASE OF USE
customer_reviews.text: WIPED IT ON AND USING THE CLOTH THAT CAME WITH THE POLISH, WIPED IT AND ALL STAINS OFF WITHOUT ANY EFFORT.....GOOD STUFF.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cleaner works well but I dont like the towel that came with it. The towel doesnt take the cleaner off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for stainless steel appliances!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I hadn't thought of looking for this product earlier since I have the same brand for glass top stoves. The ease of use along with amazing finished look equals overall exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Eggman & The Missus

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and new
customer_reviews.text: Keeps all the stainless appliances looking their best. Quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past, works great, the cleaning cloth is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Duvall-serota

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pure gold, we were trying to sell our house and the realitor could not believe the difference this stuff made in our appliances! It does make the floor VERY slippery so be careful not to spray anything but the appliance
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: You already know the product, and the value is great. No need to say more. Get it. Its works great.
customer_reviews.author: DACo

customer_reviews.title: Great polisher bad cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Used this on some of our stainless steel work in the kitchen. It polished the surface really nice but didnt clean well at all. Make sure you clean surface well after use. We had to go back and clean several times and the product goes on clear but drys white.
customer_reviews.author: Hometown

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Easily removes smudges, and leaves a nonsmudging film. Excellent product.

customer_reviews.title: Hrer
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Not runny like other items I used to use from sears.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Transforms my stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Before this product used to leave smudges all over my stainless steel appliances, now this product leaves it clean and makes it look new everytime I apply it.

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: You have to scrup a couple of times but it works.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic performance and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and polished out the spot on my refrigerator when nothing else I tried would work!
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: I recommended 💯 the best
customer_reviews.text: Omg Im in love with this. I clean my stove, fridge , microwave everything with this no finger print nothing. From now this will be my favorite toy For clean.
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: The best SS cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Best stainless steel cleaner! I used to use the wipes from this same company, but the spray and microfiber cloth give better results. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It really work!
customer_reviews.text: I just love it! Just what I’ve been looking for!

customer_reviews.title: Give it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Give it 2 stars ⭐️. Delivered on time Did not work in my kitchen on stainless stove top.
customer_reviews.author: LibertarianReview

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and did a great job! I had to use it twice on my refrigerator because I had not cleaned it properly before.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is magical
customer_reviews.text: I had been using another brand that I thought worked well until I used Weiman with the microfiber. My fridge has never looked better. No streaks! Easily applied.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Anne

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Definitely recommend this and using both the spray and towel provided together. Removes stains and spots easily and smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Did not give my stainless steel refrigerator its original shine. Try something else
customer_reviews.author: A&E

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought it. My stainless steel stove, microwave, and dishwasher look like new!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I used this yesterday when i received the delivery and it worked great,highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacor

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel appliances
customer_reviews.text: I works real good on my stainless steel appliances, thank you

customer_reviews.title: Where is my cloth
customer_reviews.text: It would of been nice to get the towel that goes with it, I would of been more of a believer that it works good used a clean cloth and I or streaks, please send me my cloth..
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I'd been using the little cleaner packet that came with my fridge. Realize now that it was no better than Windex, which I also tried. This stuff is it. No need to ever try anything else. Hint: splurge the extra couple bucks and get the cloth too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jordan

product_meta.title: Weiman Stainless Steel Cleaner and Polish - 22 Ounces (Microfiber Cloth) - Appliance Surfaces Leave Behind a Brilliant Shine
feature_bullets: #1 Selling Stainless Steel Brand - The best selling & most trusted stainless steel cleaning product.
Clean & Polish - A pH neutral formula quickly cleans, shines & protects any stainless steel surface.
Convenient - Effectively eliminates surface fingerprints, haze, grease, streaks & residue build up.
Protect Black Stainless Steel - Polish leaves protective barrier that prevents smears dirt & smudges
Use On - Stainless steel refrigerator, microwave, oven, stove, grill, sink, range-hood & trash cans
